snippet: Donald J. Trump is the target of a pile of negative political advertising in the South Carolina, including a spot from the anti-tax group Club for Growth that describes the real estate developer as a fake.
abstract: Donald J. Trump is the target of a pile of negative political advertising in the South Carolina, including a spot from the anti-tax group Club for Growth that describes the real estate developer as a fake.

headline.main: Group Attacks Donald Trump’s Conservative Credentials in Ad
headline.print_headline: In South Carolina, Trump Is Target of Ads Questioning His Conservatism
